reviews.review: fuck yeah

Half Life! Fantastico, intro lenta che scoccia i nuovi giocatori e che io adoro e nemici nemici ovunque.
Uno di quei vecchi giochi che può essere finito in speedrun in pochissimo tempo facendo ninjate che noi comuni mortali non possiamo nemmeno immaginare. Solo 0.4 ore di gioco perchè ricordo di averlo finito da un amico col suo account steam ai tempi in cui non esisteva ancora la condivisione oppure su mod che girano su internet e aggiungono un infinità di storie nuove. Giocone fantastico ~

A couple of tips.
The crowbar will not be your best friend, it is only a tool to break boxes and glass.
Be prepared for vents.
If you hear, "SECTOR SECURE" or "GO, RECON" get your Magnum or Crossbow out.
Snarks are a both your tool and possibly your demise.
Play on Hard difficulty, give yourself a challenge. 
The Black Mesa security guards are usually useless. (There are many exceptions, but in combat, don't put your trust in them.)
Don't waste your ammo on barnicles. 
You are playing the game that made Steam possible, you are playing a legendary game that had a huge impact on gaming.
Have fun.
Prepare for unforseen consequences.

В общем и целом провел в этой игре свыше нескольких десятков тысяч часов, как на разных аккаунтах в Стиме, так и в разных версиях и модификациях, и могу сказать что это лучшая игра за всё время.
Одиночная игра ещё в 00-х годах превзошла все мои ожидания, мультиплеер вообще огонь, можно бесконечно описывать разные игровые режимы на каждом сервере, которых очень большое количество и один интереснее другого, жаль что игроков всё меньше и меньше с каждым днём. 
Однозначно рекомендую пройти, а если проходили, пройти ещё раз.
Najlepšia hra aku som kedy hral ešte z mojich mladickych čias.. Má svoju dĺžku, náročnosť a niekedy bolo treba aj použiť šedú kôru :)

One of the grearest games ever made. The plot, AI, level design, weaponry, it's all just perfect! I recommend it to everyone!
I have yet to play a more immersive game period. From the word "go", I found myself completely engulfed into the pseudo world that is unfolded before your eyes.

Length of time played: 15 hours
Distance played: beaten
Personal grade: 8/10

Opinion of each part

Grading system - Wunderbar, Excellent, Good, Decent, Poor, Horrible, Terrible

Gameplay: Excellent
Stability: Good
Story: Wunderbar
Controls: good
Graphics: Good
Music: Excellent
Sounds: Excellent
Difficulty: Good

Notes: + (Positives), = (Notes), - (Negatives)

+Good array of weapons and items.
+lovely enemies 

=Little hard if you miss some stockpiles
=Confusing in more then a few spots.

-not as many potatoes as I would like

Some things never get old, and this is especially true with Half-Life. Sure you could get Black Mesa, but for me this will always be better. The gunplay,story, level design, mods, and online are staples of PC gaming and some of the most fun you will have in your lifetime. Although the graphics are a bit dated, they are still good enough to tell what everything is which is good enough for me. Its an absolute classic, I can't recommend it enough. 10/10

an amazing game for anyone to play i thought the game was challenging but not to difficult in all honesty i wish there were more of half life one to play because its amazing i believe this is valves best game ever good job freeman take us to half life 3

Half-Life is challenging yet entertaining, no matter what skill level you are Half-Life has a learning curve that keeps you on your toes. This makes for an amazing solo experience that you will never forget.

Fuck me man. I want to like this game but I just can't. I mean, i'm still in the first area and EVERY FUCKING ENEMY is a jumpscare in one form or another. I mean, if any game kills me, it will be this. Every enemy gives me a heart attack when the lunge at me, and those sounds; oh god the sounds they make make me want to curl up in a ball and cry. It's the thing of nightmares man.

Sin duda uno de mis juegos favoritos, tanto la historia como el game play y las sorpresas que te encuentras a lo largo de tu aventura, aparte de que creo fue un juego revolucionario para la epoca en la que salio.

This game is just like a real life half life.

Every time you play it, you lose part of your life and you cannot get it back no matter how hard you try.

It's a great game. Dated graphics never bothered me so the lowest point of this game doesn't mean much. Great FPS gameplay with interesting puzzles that require you to think. Finished it after 10 hours of play and I must say it's a very well done game.

You are Gordon Freeman, you are working at Black Mesa, you come to the test, and the test going wrong. And you get crowbar for an adventure....

This game is great, reminds me to my brother played this.. from a long time...

If you haven't tried it, try it now!

11/10 - The best game i ever played.

Buen juego, pero más que todo para su época, creo que ha envejecido bastante mal.
Si quieres saber de que va el Half-Life y por qué la gente está tan hypeada con el 3, te recomendaría leerte la historia, es nada, y quizá usar tu tiempo en algo que se disfrute más, como el 2, que lo acabo de empezar y tiene alta pinta. No me molesta tanto los bugs y gráficos que tiene, son de esperarse en un juego así de viejo, lo que me molesta es el movimiento, es un puto asco, y ¿a quién carajos se le ocurrió poner puto parkour a lo largo de todo un juego en el que estás todo el tiempo sobre hielo? Si querés sobrevivir a eso tenés que usar un guardado manual constantemente.
El multijugador puede tener sus momentos zarpados, aunque está bastante lleno de cheateros.
Me gustan los diversos enemigos y armas, aunque hay un par que son bastante useless. Es re zarpado el mundo alienígena, cuando fui flipé bastante, no me lo esperaba para nada, y luego de estar en el complejo tanto tiempo se sintió bien un cambi de aire, pero hasta en las últimas horas de juego hacés cosas randoms como tener que pegarle como 20 bazookazos a un enemigo para que se mueva o saltar de naves espaciales a naves espaciales de formas q no se si si quiera se suponía que se pudieran hacer.

[h1]One of the best games, if not the best game I ever played, great AI for its time, takes you into a new world, the story is so deep and fun.

This game is what games should be, perfect in every way, almost 20 years and this game is still playable.

A very challenging and sometimes frustrating game. However, those aside it's not your typical first person shooter where you just lolshoot your way to victory. You need to actually use your brain to get past things. This game is very old, in fact it's only one year younger than me, but it's still an awesome game none the less. It's a great prequel to half life 2. Plus it's fun sometimes to whack the scientists in the face.

If it were'nt for this game, then Half-Life 2 wouldn't be here. I enjoyed the sequel a lot, but this is a great game to get hooked on this very superbed franchise. This brings a whole lot of variety of things that Half-Life 2 doesn't have: more enemies, more weapons, and a pretty long campaign. This series would be the first game to try out. 20/10, would buy it again for multiple systems.

Lo jugué haya por el 2000 cuando tenía unos 10 años en el ciber, años después lo volvía jugar pero en pirata, y hoy 15/06/2015 me lo he vuelto a completar por 3ª vez, aquí en Steam, y me sigue gustando como el primer día, con obras de arte así da gusto jugar y amar este mundillo.

Uno de los mejores juegos de FPS que he jugado en mi vida. 
La verdad ya lo habia jugado un poco antes y me gusto mucho y ahora que lo compre y lo pase estoy realmente complacido y no me defrauda. A pesar de que salio hace muchos años el juego sigue gustando y no cansa de jugarlo. Sus controles y tematicas son una joya. No cabe duda que estoy juego definio los FPS.

Sin duda compralo y mas en este momento que esta en rebaja. Recomiendo comprar el Half-life Complete, viene toda la colleccion y te ahorras un dinerito.

Mi calificacion es 10/10. Lo recomiendo ampliamente.
AWSOME GAME!!! KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK! My only problem is the graphics, there not great but there ok, still a great game!
